name: Hamstronaut
description:
This game was created as a school project but we couldn't simply leave it as such.

You play as Marco, a space bound hamstronaut on a rescue mission for your dear friend Polo after both of you were abducted by aliens. Escape through the space station defeating every alien in your path and collect every seed you find, you'll need them if you ever wish to save Polo!

This was created by team Last Surprise which consists of (with additional should I get the links to them) :

https://aries-makes.itch.io/
https://bojarzin.itch.io/
https://salick.itch.io/
